title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s core repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, embed, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embedding backends in chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-model, code highlighting, RAG, user auth).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models with fluent API.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma; ingest PDFs and query with local embeddings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s spot; inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI for Ollama written in Rust; browse, chat, and manage models from the terminal.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models on macOS/Linux/Windows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-nvidia-triton
summary: Triton backend for Ollama enabling batched inference and GPU orchestration at scale.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks for CPU & GPU inference with Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; generate, chat, embed, and pull models via typed client.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, completion, and embeddings with fluent configuration.
